_source.short_desc: An intelligent sales CRM that helps sales reps be more productive, increase their sales, and engage clients.
_source.long_desc:
Salesmate helps businesses close more deals faster. Our easy-to-use interface and automated workflows let your sales team focus on the right deals at the right time. Never miss a beat and start closing more deals.

Some of our hottest features:
- Built-in Calling w/ Power Dialer
- Customer Journey Automation
- Email Drip Sequences
- Workflow Automation
- Meeting Scheduler
- Web forms

Give us a free test ride today and our friendly staff is ready to help you!
_source.pricing_details:
Salesmate offers three pricing tears, starter, growth, and boost, based on the features and individual requirements. You can sign up for Salesmate free trial for 15 days. 
 
Starter Plan: $12/user/month, billed annually
 
Growth Plan: $24/user/month, billed annually
 
Boost Plan: $40/user/month, billed annually
_source.target_audience: We help businesses of all sizes to help grow their sales teams with fun and easy to use CRM that sales teams love to use.

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Performance Metrics
category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Business Card/Badge Scanning
category_features.definition: Capture contact information by scanning a physical item and having the system automatically extract data from the scan

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Data Extraction
category_features.definition: Automatically extract information from documents or websites and input it into a database in a specified format

category_features.name: Lead Distribution
category_features.definition: Route and distribute your leads to third party buyers

category_features.name: Lead Notifications
category_features.definition: Receive an alert when new lead comes in

category_features.name: Lead Nurturing
category_features.definition: Develop relationships with potential buyers throughout their buying journey by providing helpful information along the way

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Identify which leads fit your target audience and are most likely to become customers

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: Online Forms
category_features.definition: Create new forms or from templates to help with creation of transactional content

category_features.name: AI/Machine Learning
category_features.definition: Software program that continuously adjusts its behavior based on observed data

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Customizable Scoring
category_features.definition: Adjust the weighting of various scoring criteria to control how scores are calculated

category_features.name: Data Enrichment
category_features.definition: Combines data from internal sources with disparate data from other internal systems or external sources

category_features.name: Demographic / Firmographic Data
category_features.definition: Characteristics for segmenting companies or customers

category_features.name: Lead Distribution
category_features.definition: Manually or automatically assign leads to sales reps

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: Multiple Scoring Models
category_features.definition: Create multiple models or equations for generating scores

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Prioritization
category_features.definition: Arrange activities and tasks based on their relative importance

category_features.name: Process/Workflow Automation
category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflows

related_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
related_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.  You also get access to 150,000+ sales organizations and a 2 million user-strong community that are passionate about sales growth.

related_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with an online, omnichannel customer lifecycle management platform with AI-powered features.
related_products.features: Zoho CRM is an online CRM software used by 250,000 businesses+ in 180 countries to convert more leads, engage with customers, and grow their revenue. Key features include contact management, sales funnels, pipeline management, workflow automation, AI-powered conversational assistant, task management, managing marketing campaigns, sales forecasting, inventory management, reporting & analytics, and seamless integration with 500+ popular third-party apps.

related_products.short_desc: HubSpot CRM has everything you need to organize, track, and build better relationships with leads and customers.
related_products.features: Whether you've got a small team of five or a sophisticated sales force of 500, HubSpot offers pricing and packaging options that grow with you. HubSpot customer relationship management (CRM) software is built for companies that want to spend less time logging data. It keeps all your contacts in one centralized, customizable database. And you can see everything about a lead in one place -- no more digging through inboxes to find information. Start using the free HubSpot CRM today.

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk provides the complete customer service solution that's easy to use and scales with your business.
related_products.features: Zendesk is the only complete customer service solution, that is both easy to use and scales with your business. On average, companies using Zendesk increase customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% - at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

related_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement online CRM software tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
related_products.features: Pipedrive is an online customer relationship management tool that teams of all sizes love using. With 95,000+ paying customers spanning across 179 countries, sales teams are drawn in by our cloud-based CRMs simple yet powerful design that prioritizes usability above all else. When using Pipedrive, nothing falls through the cracks, allowing your team to spend less time filing and more time selling with an online CRM that is both powerful and agile.

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: LiveChat allows for instant communication with on-site visitors and customers, building customer loyalty in the process.
related_products.features: With LiveChat, you can have a direct contact with the customer that allows you to build and improve loyalty to your brand. It helps you support customers in need of help. Plus, it allows you to increase your sales by engaging the right prospects at the right time as well as by generating a ton of new leads.

related_products.short_desc:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up
related_products.features: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: #1 CRM Software For Small Business
related_products.features: #1 CRM Software - Marketing 360 CRM gives you that ability to manage all your leads & customers in one place. Add as many team members as you need, create custom fields to store any contact information, assign tasks, track deals, and sales pipelines and so much more. Need help importing contacts and get live support that is included as well.

related_products.short_desc: Act! Premium empowers you to market better, sell more, and create customers for life.
related_products.features: Act! Premium, a powerful CRM and Marketing Automation tool in one platform, is perfect for small and midsize businesses looking to market better, sell more, and create customers for life. With unparalleled flexibility and freedom of choice, Act! Premium accommodates the unique ways you do business, whether it's on-premises (Act! Premium Desktop), in the cloud (Act! Premium Cloud), or, you can leverage a hybrid deployment for maximum flexibility!

related_products.short_desc: Userlike is the first and only live chat software to help your business win and nurture customers across messaging channels.
related_products.features:
Userlike is the messaging-based CRM alternative, combining website chat with mobile messaging. 

Chat with customers and leads via your website, Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, Telegram and SMS. Connect your chatbot and automate parts of your customer interactions. 

Born and hosted in Germany. Userlike keeps your and your customers' data safe with a 100% GDPR-compliant communication solution.

similar_products.short_desc: Bigin helps small businesses move away from spreadsheets and get started with a CRM solution that is truly built for their needs.
similar_products.features:
We built a dedicated CRM for small businesses to help bridge the gap between lost leads and messy spreadsheets. 

With the sheer motive to be simple, Bigin is packed with just the right features, with a user-friendly interface, at a pocket friendly price to fit your small business like a glove! 
Bigin brings you everything you need-multiple pipelines, built-in telephony, workflow, a bunch of seamless integrations and a lot more, just to ensure you manage your customer relationships with ease.

similar_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
similar_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.  You also get access to 150,000+ sales organizations and a 2 million user-strong community that are passionate about sales growth.

similar_products.short_desc:
Everything you need in an online CRM: client management, proposals, contracts, payments, & more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
similar_products.features:
The go-to online CRM for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

HoneyBook makes it easy to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

similar_products.short_desc: HubSpot CRM has everything you need to organize, track, and build better relationships with leads and customers.
similar_products.features: Whether you've got a small team of five or a sophisticated sales force of 500, HubSpot offers pricing and packaging options that grow with you. HubSpot customer relationship management (CRM) software is built for companies that want to spend less time logging data. It keeps all your contacts in one centralized, customizable database. And you can see everything about a lead in one place -- no more digging through inboxes to find information. Start using the free HubSpot CRM today.

similar_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement online CRM software tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
similar_products.features: Pipedrive is an online customer relationship management tool that teams of all sizes love using. With 95,000+ paying customers spanning across 179 countries, sales teams are drawn in by our cloud-based CRMs simple yet powerful design that prioritizes usability above all else. When using Pipedrive, nothing falls through the cracks, allowing your team to spend less time filing and more time selling with an online CRM that is both powerful and agile.

similar_products.short_desc: Freshsales is packed with features and a highly intuitive UI so that you don't have to juggle multiple tools to run your business.
similar_products.features: Freshsales is a full-fledged sales force automation solution for sales teams. It provides everything a salesperson needs to- attract quality leads, engage in contextual conversations, drive deals with AI-powered insights, and nurture customer relationships. With built-in email, phone, chat, and telephony, Freshsales empowers sales teams with more time for selling by automating the sales process and increases efficiency and productivity in their daily activities.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with an online, omnichannel customer lifecycle management platform with AI-powered features.
similar_products.features: Zoho CRM is an online CRM software used by 250,000 businesses+ in 180 countries to convert more leads, engage with customers, and grow their revenue. Key features include contact management, sales funnels, pipeline management, workflow automation, AI-powered conversational assistant, task management, managing marketing campaigns, sales forecasting, inventory management, reporting & analytics, and seamless integration with 500+ popular third-party apps.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage & make the most of your customer interactions with SutiCRM, intuitive CRM software specifically tailored to your business needs.
similar_products.features: SutiCRM offers you marketing, salesforce, and customer support automation from a single system and allows you to grow your business exponentially. Its analytics, dynamic dashboards, and reporting give you a 360-degree view of your CRM efforts, help you gain valuable insights in real-time, and make the best from your customer interactions. This intuitive solution meets the unique needs of businesses of all sizes.

similar_products.short_desc: As the #1 rated CRM by QuickBooks users, Method:CRM streamlines your business from lead to repeat and everything in between.
similar_products.features: A QuickBooks CRM platform, Method seamlessly syncs with your QuickBooks data, offering a shared source of truth across your organization. With Method:CRM, a fully customizable solution, you can manage leads, automate workflows and serve your customers better with self-serve portals all within a single tool. The #1 rated CRM by QuickBooks users, Method:CRM empowers thousands of small and mid-sized businesses to scale operations, increase sales and improve their bottom line.

similar_products.short_desc: The Sales CRM With Marketing Suite That Builds Rapport With You. CRM, Email Marketing, Social Posting, Texting, Video Email, And More.
similar_products.features:
98% of customers rate VipeCloud's Value For Money at 4 stars and above! 

VipeCloud is the Sales CRM with Marketing Suite that builds rapport with you. Our All-In-One solution includes CRM, Email Marketing, Social Posting, Texting, Video Email, Integrations, and More.

With VipeCloud's single solution + rapport building, your business will increase efficiency and accelerate growth. It's no surprise 99% of customers rate our support at 4+ stars.

similar_products.short_desc: Our products include: Auto Dialer, Cloud Phone System, Progressive Dialer, CRM & Lead Management, and Email & SMS Marketing Automation.
similar_products.features: Ricochet360 is the All-in-One Auto Dialer, CRM/Lead Management, and Marketing Automation Platform that creates predictable revenue outcomes by automating 95% of your agents daily sales workflow. Designed for both inbound & outbound agents looking for a competitive advantage, Ricochet360 enables your team to call a new lead in less than one second, then automatically nurture and engage prospects throughout the entire sales process.

similar_products.short_desc: Tripleseat is a Sales and Event Management web application that increases event sales and streamlines the planning process.
similar_products.features: Tripleseat is a Sales and Event Management web application that generates sales and streamlines the planning process for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues. It is the first web-based system created by hospitality event managers for hospitality event managers. Since 2008 Tripleseat has taken the restaurant business by storm providing solutions and simplifying the event process from start to finish. Over 2,500 venues and18,000+ event industry expert trust Tripleseat.

similar_products.short_desc: Store, manage and label your leads, contacts and clients in one centralized online hub, and have it all handy, wherever you are.
similar_products.features: Gain and retain clients with a powerful CRM app by vcita. Store, manage and label your leads, contacts and clients in one centralized online hub, get a birds-eye view of your clients' history, appointments, payments, invoices, documents and conversations. Easily collaborate with your team, assigning clients, appointments and incoming requests to staff members. Have all the information handy wherever you are and whenever you need it with a friendly mobile app.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Service software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Service tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Service software enables an organization to manage and track customer relationships and support services. From trouble ticket tracking to complaint resolution reporting, Customer Service software solutions allow organizations to manage and assess the quality of their interactions with customers. Customer Service applications also assist in the management and distribution of an internal knowledge base, providing customer service representatives with the information necessary to resolve customer complaints. Customer Service software is related to Call Center software, Help Desk software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Help Desk software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Help Desk tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Help Desk software enables organizations to respond more efficiently to users. Support software can aid in answering technical and functional questions by providing improved methodologies for ticket tracking, IT management and customer service support. Integrating these elements improves the ability of customer service departments to provide fast and effective support to employees, end users and customers. Help Desk solutions can also facilitate the flow of new information from users, contributing to an organization's existing knowledge base. Help Desk software is related to Call Center software and Customer Service software .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Knowledge Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Knowledge Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Knowledge Management software offers ways to optimize the utility of intellectual capital and intangible assets by capturing, preserving and organizing institutional knowledge in a measurable format. Knowledge Management solutions allow successful strategies to be transferred and replicated throughout an organization. Implementation can be inwardly focused on faster learning, new knowledge creation, and innovation or directed outwardly, providing a self-guided service path for customers. Knowledge Management software is related to Business Intelligence software and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Live Chat software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Live Chat tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Live Chat software helps organizations connect with their customers in real time. Live Chat applications can be used for customer support, lead generation, and customer engagement. This type of software includes widgets that can be integrated into existing websites, as well as more robust stand alone solutions that allow businesses to track customer interactions, response and conversion rates.

infographics.infographic_title: The Top 20 Most Affordable CRM Software Report

related_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
related_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.  You also get access to 150,000+ sales organizations and a 2 million user-strong community that are passionate about sales growth.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution built on an omnichannel platform.
related_products.features: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution. Key features include contact management, sales funnels, pipeline management, workflow automation, AI-powered conversational assistant, task management, managing marketing campaigns, sales forecasting, customer support & service, inventory management, reporting & analytics, and seamlessly integrate with 500+ popular business apps in a single business system.

related_products.short_desc: HubSpot CRM has everything you need to organize, track, and build better relationships with leads and customers.
related_products.features: Whether you've got a small team of five or a sophisticated sales force of 500, HubSpot offers pricing and packaging options that grow with you. HubSpot customer relationship management (CRM) software is built for companies that want to spend less time logging data. It keeps all your contacts in one centralized, customizable database. And you can see everything about a lead in one place -- no more digging through inboxes to find information. Start using the free HubSpot CRM today.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement CRM software tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
related_products.features: Pipedrive is a sales-focused customer relationship management tool that teams of all sizes love using. With 100'000+ paying customers spanning across 179 countries, sales teams are drawn in by our CRMs simple yet powerful design that prioritizes usability above all else. When using Pipedrive, nothing falls through the cracks, allowing your team to spend less time filing and more time selling with a CRM software that is both agile and powerful.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: ActiveCampaign CRM helps you sell more in less time by combining automated lead prioritization, task creation, and contact management.
related_products.features: ActiveCampaign's CRM combines contact organization with sales automation, helping you sell more in less time. Prioritize your leads, keep track of your tasks, and automate contact management so nothing falls through the cracks. See your whole sales process at a glance and track every interaction, keeping your team on the same page. Features like lead scoring, win probability, and automated segmentation combined with marketing automation turns your team into a well-oiled, deal-closing machine.

related_products.short_desc:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up
related_products.features: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: Run your business your way with a fully integrated CRM for small to medium sized businesses.
related_products.features: Stay organized as you scale and grow. Finally, a CRM that?s easy to use, fully customizable and puts you in control of how you manage your leads, customers, tasks, team, projects, marketing and more. Create your free account to start customizing your CRM today.

similar_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Zendesk Sell is sales CRM software that helps you close more deals.
similar_products.features: Zendesk Sell is sales CRM software that helps you close more deals. This sales platform tracks all your customer interactions in one unified interface. It's quick to implement and easy to use: 70% of companies are able to get Sell up and running in 7 days or less. Your teams will be able to focus on selling not admin work and can spend less time on data entry. 80% of customers agree that Zendesk has made their teams more efficient.

similar_products.short_desc: NetSuite CRM+ delivers your business with powerful front-office capabilities in a single, cloud-based CRM solution.
similar_products.features: NetSuites CRM+ is a complete, front-office solution that unlocks a real-time, 360-degree view of your customers. CRM+ seamlessly integrates your customer-focused activities with accounting, e-commerce, warehousing and shipping applications to support your entire sales process and customer life cycle starting from a lead, and progressing through opportunity, sales order, fulfillment, renewal, upsell, cross-sell and support.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve your team's accountability and productivity with flexible CRM that matches your sales process exactly.
similar_products.features: Improve your team's accountability and productivity with a flexible CRM that matches your complex sales process exactly. Track tasks, leads, and opportunities in real time. Built-in mobile forms and workflows keep everything moving, trigger-based actions make your team more productive, and automated reporting keeps your stakeholders in the know. Find out why over 80% of the Fortune 50 trusts Quickbase.

similar_products.short_desc: Act! Premium empowers you to market better, sell more, and create customers for life.
similar_products.features: Act! Premium, a powerful CRM and Marketing Automation tool in one platform, is perfect for small and midsize businesses looking to market better, sell more, and create customers for life. With unparalleled flexibility and freedom of choice, Act! Premium accommodates the unique ways you do business, whether it's on-premises (Act! Premium Desktop), in the cloud (Act! Premium Cloud), or, you can leverage a hybrid deployment for maximum flexibility!

similar_products.short_desc: TigerLRM is an all-in-one Sales Enablement Software with tools for Content Management, Training & Coaching, In-Built CRM, and more.
similar_products.features:
TigerLRM is an All-in-One Sales Enablement Software with essential tools such as Content Management, Training & Coaching, In-Built CRM, and more!

Bring out the Tiger in your sales team with a highly intuitive, easy-to-use suite of Sales Enablement and CRM tools that help sales professionals focus on hunting and closing leads. TigerLRM comes fully equipped with built-in features and tools that cut down on sales guesswork and presumptions.

similar_products.short_desc:
Every CRM tool you need to manage clients, proposals, contracts, invoices, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
similar_products.features:
The go-to CRM for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

HoneyBook makes it easy to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

similar_products.short_desc: monday sales CRM empowers sales teams to manage every aspect of their sales cycle and customer data in one centralized place.
similar_products.features: Perfect for small-medium businesses, monday sales CRM is a no-code fully-customizable CRM built on top of monday.com Work OS. Dubbed the CRM without the frustration, it handles all sales processes and client communication in one place. From capturing leads, managing contact info, tracking deals or collaborating across departments, monday sales CRM lets you manage it all. You can use built-in automations or easily create your own to streamline any manual work so you can focus more time on sales.

similar_products.short_desc: The Sales CRM With Marketing Suite That Builds Rapport With You. CRM, Email Marketing, Social Posting, Texting, Video Email, And More.
similar_products.features:
98% of customers rate VipeCloud's Value For Money at 4 stars and above! 

VipeCloud is the Sales CRM with Marketing Suite that builds rapport with you. Our All-In-One solution includes CRM, Email Marketing, Social Posting, Texting, Video Email, Integrations, and More.

With VipeCloud's single solution + rapport building, your business will increase efficiency and accelerate growth. It's no surprise 99% of customers rate our support at 4+ stars.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Management software provides powerful tools that enable storage, tracking, and management of contact information throughout an organization. Contact Management applications allow organizations to function more effectively by distributing current contact information for customers, contractors, vendors and others to all levels and locations of an organization. Contact Management solutions also often incorporate efficiency-increasing features such as lead management tools, employee task logs and customer interaction histories. Contact Management software is related to Campaign Management software, Lead Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Tracking software enables businesses and sales teams to monitor pipelines, manage steps in the sales process, and track key performance numbers.
